title: All Seasons of The Chosen to Exclusively Stream on Prime Video — Season 5 Set for June Premiere
description: Amazon Prime Video is the chosen one. As part of an expansive deal between Amazon MGM Studios and The Chosen creator Dallas Jenkins’ 5&2 Studios that was announced on Sunday evening, Prime Video will become the exclusive U.S. streaming home for the first five seasons of the Jesus-centric historical drama, as well as the two […]

title: SNL50: Watch All the Highlights From the Star-Studded Anniversary Special (Updating Live)
description: Saturday Night Live is celebrating a milestone birthday… and a whole bunch of big names are showing up for the party. In honor of the sketch comedy institution’s 50th season, NBC is airing a live, three-hour event on Sunday — titled SNL50: The Anniversary Special — with dozens of cast members, hosts and musical guests from decades past […]
